name: The Furry Arms Tavern
description: The tavern manages to be simultaneously wholesome and questionable, with sticky tables that have witnessed a thousand philosophical debates and probably a few minor crimes. Peanut shells crunch underfoot with satisfying authority. The bar itself is a magnificent slab of oak that could double as a life raft or a shield wall, currently serving its more important purpose of dispensing liquid courage and regret. Behind the bar, bottles of varying repute line shelves that look one sneeze away from collapse. A chalkboard lists the drinks and snacks available. A narrow staircase descends to the south, from which emanate sounds of enthusiastic combat and the occasional triumphant (or defeated) 'wump.'

messages.greeting: Welcome to the Furry Arms! Your humble, lovable bartender Grover is here to serve you!
messages.noSuchItem: Oh dear! I am so sorry, but we do not have that item!
messages.noSellItem: I am very sorry, but I cannot buy that from you! This is a tavern, not a pawn shop!
messages.cantAfford: Oh no! You do not have enough coins for that! But Grover still likes you very much!
messages.successBuy: That will be %s! Thank you for your patronage! Grover hopes you enjoy!
